titles.title: 552 O Master Let Me Walk With Thee (familiar easy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Master let me walk with Thee
In lowly paths of service free
Tell me Thy secret
Help me bear
The strain of toil
The fret of care

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Help me the slow of heart
To move
By some clear winning
Word of love
Teach me the wayward
Feet to stay
And guide them
In the homeward way

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Teach me Thy patience
Still with Thee
In closer dearer company
In work that keeps
Faith sweet and strong
In trust that triumphs
Over wrong

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
In hope that sends
A shinning ray
Far down the future's
Broad'ning way
In peace that only
Thou canst give
With Thee
O Master let me live
